# Film Photography Guide App

## Project Overview
A comprehensive guide to film photography for beginners, built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- next-themes (dark/light mode)
- lucide-react (icons)
- framer-motion (animations)

## Project Structure
- `/src/app` - Pages and layouts using App Router
- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/components/ui` - Base UI components (buttons, cards, etc.)
- `/src/components/layout` - Layout components (header, nav, footer)
- `/src/components/features` - Feature-specific components
- `/src/data` - Static data for films, cameras, lenses
- `/src/hooks` - Custom React hooks
- `/src/lib` - Utility functions
- `/src/types` - TypeScript type definitions
- `/src/context` - React context providers

## Development
```bash
npm run dev
```

## Deployment
- Frontend: Vercel
- Backend (future): Supabase

## Design Guidelines
- iOS-like smooth animations
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Clean, minimal aesthetic
- Accessible color contrasts
